Global communication: With everyone understanding every language, global communication would become much easier and more efficient. People from different cultures and backgrounds would be able to communicate with each other without the need for interpreters or translators. This would lead to a more connected and understanding world.

Cultural exchange: Understanding different languages would allow people to better appreciate and understand different cultures. This could lead to more cultural exchange and understanding, as people would be able to communicate with each other more easily.
Economic benefits: Improved communication would lead to more efficient business transactions and better relationships between countries. This could lead to increased trade and economic growth.

Diplomacy: With everyone understanding every language, diplomacy would become much easier. Diplomats would be able to communicate directly with leaders of other countries, without the need for interpreters or translators. This would lead to more effective diplomacy and better relationships between countries.

Education: Understanding different languages would allow people to better understand and appreciate different literature, history, and art. This would lead to more well-rounded education and a better understanding of the world.
